articles.title: Cormac McCarthy, celebrated US novelist, dies aged 89 - The Guardian
articles.description: Author of Blood Meridian, The Road and No Country for Old Men died in his home of natural causes, publisher announces
articles.content:
Cormac McCarthy has died at the age of 89, the American authors publisher has announced.
McCarthy died in his home of natural causes. His son John McCarthy confirmed the death.
